website_summaries.verdict: The best pair of dirt biking gloves that have an emphasis on flexibility for intense racing.
pros: Fabric mesh easily stretches with each finger, providing a full range of motion
The palm has extra padding to keep the hands protected in case of a crash
cons: Individual finger digits are not protected by extra padding

customer_reviews.title: Cheap gloves, don't expect much.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap gloves. They do work as intended but quality-wise they don't hold up very well. I've had mine for two weeks, I've ridden almost everyday to work and back with them and they're already starting to rip apart at the stitchings. I can use my phone with them on (iPhone X) but durability is almost non existent. Also-I bought them in XXL and they still barely fit, once they're on it's ok but getting them on is a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Overall glove felt solid and well made. After my third ride, the index finger became unstitched. Gloves are in perfect shape, the stitching was just poor quality. I reached out to Lytle group that sold them, couldn’t get through to get a replacement. Contacted FOX and stated they have a 1 year warranty on all products and to contact vendor I purchased from. Very frustrated. Only had 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Hinojos

customer_reviews.title: Same great glove, Same major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair of these gloves with nearly 22,000 on my Yamaha's odometer, city driving in Los Angeles. Great glove except for that stupid velcro tab that only works for a couple weeks. Are snaps a rare commodity now? That is scary. There used to be many snaps, and other types of closures too. It seems wherever these are made they can't get snaps, I'd like to send them some because I love these gloves except for that velcro tab. They could make me a custom pair with snaps instead of velcro, which is how they should have been made in the first place. Great gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Saint

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have used these gloves a number of times now. At first they are not very comfortable. They are hard to put on and take off. The Velcro strap is at times difficult too use. As I continue to wear them, they are getting a little more comfortable. They are thicker than other bike gloves so they are definitely warmer while riding and seem like they will be durable. That is coming in handy this winter as I am biking routinely in the upper 40 and 50 degree range. I will definitely find something else as the weather turns warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Some drawbacks, but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: The seams dig into my index knuckle, the Velcro has a tenancy to close itself when trying to remove the gloves, and they've started fraying a bit. They work fine otherwise, but the grip isn't anything to write home about, and the added rubber on the fingers for grip does nothing. They do have good ventilation, and they do allow almost perfect dexterity when not near the limits of digit movement, as proven by being able to do things such as type, use a phone, and even to use a controller for gaming without misinputs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Perdicaro

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My first pair held up for a solid 5 months of mountain biking 2-3 times a week. I only replaced them because the index fingers have worn through on the side mesh from their battles with Velcro and burrs. This new pair seems to be identical to the old ones and I’m expecting another good season from them.
customer_reviews.author: thebarzeen

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong replacement
customer_reviews.text: It had a slight barely noticeable slice near the Velcro opening when we received it. Within a few seconds of trying it on, the slice turned into a complete tear and is not able to be worn. So I returned it hoping to get an exact replacement. They sent me a different color and size. So now I have to return those. I’m giving it one more try...only because it’s a birthday gift. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit well. The stretchy material makes for a good feel which has some give while on rides. It does seem to grip well with the handle bars, but the stitching seems to be questionable. So far it’s held up well, but I can tell the added pressure might create some issues later on.
customer_reviews.author: Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boy. He opened the package, put them on and went for a ride on his dirt bike. They ripped the very first use. They were extremely hard to get on. Once he got them on, he loved the feel and length. He normally wears a size small, and even has an older pair of dirt paws in a small. These are just poor design. The wrist stitching blew out, and so did the pointer finger on the right glove.
customer_reviews.author: Wilie Kent

customer_reviews.title: innacurate sizes !! fox screwed the pooch !
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers said the sizes are innacurate. I have purchased so many fox gloves and I'm always the same size but for some reason these gloves are extremely small. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: 3 days of riding and they are falling apart! Sent back.
customer_reviews.text: I have had fox gloves for over 10 years dirt bike and MTB. Every pair before this one held up great! This pair did not last, sent them back and tried a pair of HAND UP gloves. They have been great. Will not go back to fox unless they improve the quality.
customer_reviews.author: M_White008

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Feels thinner than I was expecting. I couldn't even comment on comfort because these gloves are so small I can't even get them on. I normally wear a size large glove which is what these are. Returning because it looks and feels maybe two sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Y

customer_reviews.title: Not so durable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were very comfortable and fit well but they were not very durable wore the gloves one time and the stitching popped and ripped, the gloves were very hard to take on and off as well
customer_reviews.author: marc32

customer_reviews.title: Order a few sizes larger!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I ordered the men’s small for my average sized 10 year old son and IM SO GLAD I DID BECAUSE THEY WERE PERFECT. I’m a small ladies size and they fit me also... such weird sizing, but good quality/craftsmanship. Great gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized like A*
customer_reviews.text: I run Alpinestars motorcycle gloves in a 2XL, and I got these in a 2XL, and that works perfectly. If you are unsure of sizing and know how A* gloves fit, you might be good to size the Fox gloves the same.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - tore in a few rides
customer_reviews.text: Tore in 2 spots after max 15 rides with no crashes. Returned today for refund. Not worth even $10. Had an XL sized Fox MTB glove (smaller size, this was 2XL btw) and they just tore after 3-4 years of consistent usage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sookazian

customer_reviews.title: Product runs small. Great build and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Make SURE you get one SIZE LARGER than your normal size these do run small. I'm impressed on the build quality. I will be returning the ones i got and be getting one size larger
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a friend recommended them. Very pleased with the fit. When gripping the throttle the fox logo wraps around the knuckles which works well as extra padding around the most vulnerable parts of the hand. I did notice a thread missing in one of the fingers seems. This resulted in a slight hole where the fingers bend but easily fixed with a single stitch.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Dedeurwaerder

customer_reviews.title: Tight hole, loose hook and loop
customer_reviews.text: The hook and loop closure system failed the second ride out. The worst thing about these gloves is the opening for the hand. I ordered an XL, but I can barely squeeze my hand into the glove. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Rider

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and similar out there, but nothing like Fox
customer_reviews.text: Its Fox. They know what they're doing by now. I use these for mountain biking as well as a cruiser motorcycle commute. Finger tips have started to get a small fray, if that continues I will exchange and depending how the customer service goes, if I still recommend these. There are way cheaper gloves of similar quality but I wanted Fox, not a knock off, and these do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Protect your hands!
customer_reviews.text: First pair got pretty tattered within’ the first two rides. The seems came apart but Amazon replaced them quickly. The second pair has held up much better. They fit my hands well and help keep my grip strong. There’s not much padding in the palm which I prefer, keeps your hands from fatigue but still softens the grip well.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Durability could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like my gloves to fit rather snug so they don't move around. I have lengthy/slim hands so these out great in medium. They feel pretty nice and have good enough grip spots. 4/27/19 update: gloves have been used only about 6 times and the left one has started ripping already between my thumb and forefinger. Expected better quality for such a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson specifically asked for these gloves. He mountain bikes on a team in CO. He opened his present and was very pleased! He tried them on and size L was perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: aikrussow

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Go up at LEAST one size, if not two. My normal size, medium prevented me to not even being able to put it on my hand. Looks like a good glove otherwise, but had to return and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Tronowsky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of dirt paw. The first pair are 8 years old and still now just starting to see the accent graphics beginning to peel! That's what brought me back again.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/value.
customer_reviews.text: Crap gloves, improper fit, thin weak material. Over priced for actual value. A pair of Harbor Freight gloves would be better and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Microwave

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger size than you think you’ll need.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for a few months now, and they’re great! The only issue I’ve ran into, is they are starting to come apart around the tips of the fingers, and they’re starting to “fray” everywhere. They’re comfortable, but get a size bigger than you think you’ll need. At work I wear large gloves, mechanix and leather. So I bought large in these, and they are a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! Super comfortable and look great. I really like that when I wear them I can still use the touch screen on my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you think you’ll have a return
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest not purchasing from this vendor. Product arrived fine, and up on trying on the gloves they didn’t fit despite me using their sizing guide. I’ve not requested a return and they have come back saying I need to pay for the return shipping cost and on top of that pay a 10% restock fee. There are plenty of vendors who have good customer service and normal return policies.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eng

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need a size bigger than normal but it has a lots of armor for Bush waking but the wrist is a little tight
customer_reviews.author: Holly P.

customer_reviews.title: poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: I wore them twice and the stitching has come apart. I will continue to purchase my gloves from the local store.
customer_reviews.author: Hams DAD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for any kind of biking
customer_reviews.text: Having used these a few times now, I really like them. They stop my sweaty hands from slipping, while also providing light padding. They are very light and nice material that doesn't overheat my hands or cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than some other Fox gloves. Looks great, protects well not as hot as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't fallen apart like some other people claim they do. Better quality and great looks than expected. Plus it gives you some hand armor without the heat and weight.
customer_reviews.author: REB4

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove! Medium is a lil tight on my hand, 26yr male hand
customer_reviews.author: BigPaco

customer_reviews.title: Sized small
customer_reviews.text: These were very small, like so small I couldn't see how someone with hands that small could even ride a dirt birk.
customer_reviews.author: Patro

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for two rides and they already falling apart on the index finger don’t buy them they really cheap made
customer_reviews.author: mao

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: They do fit well, but mine ripped at the seams a month after purchasing, about a week after the return period. I thought Fox sold quality items but this product indicates otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: noah novotny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few weeks now and they are super comfortable. Even when its hot out they dont bother me at all. They grip well and they do help reduce the vibration from the handle bars.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J.

customer_reviews.title: Fox quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Fox products since the 90's when I rode mountain bike and motocross. I grabbed a pair of these since I started biking again and the quality and comfort are the same as I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value gloves. The touchscreen compatiblity works as it's supposed to. Didn't have to be broken in to feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: These gloves appear to be well made, but I can't get my hands into them. I usually wear 2xx gloves, but these are more like 1x.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bit tight for actual size
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly they fit more snug than the last XL Fox pair we bought. They fit more like a large. Buy one size larger if contemplating comfort and fit of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Weyand

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. I have small hands and they fit a bit loose but still comfortable. Even white long long nails still fit fine
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Protection and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have already protected my hands and are very comfortable to wear. Make sure you get the right size, I had to go a little larger than I would've thought.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Hope they last
customer_reviews.text: I swear someone said these, “...gloves are sexy” as I rode by. I swear.
customer_reviews.author: Jumriang R.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought/worn several pairs of these exact same gloves all medium , so when these "mediums" showed up I couldn't even get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First use they tore/came apart.
customer_reviews.text: First time out with these gloves, within two hours they were splitting at the seams and starting to wear on the outer fingers. Super comfortable and they grip well, major downfall is the quality. Probably will look at other gloves to replace these, not going to buy a new pair of gloves every ride.
customer_reviews.author: Crowdslayer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs very small
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a large in all riding gloves except these. They don't even begin to go on. They do look nice and will keep them for one of the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: TeesWorld23

customer_reviews.title: Great balance of comfort, protection and feel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair for moto-trials and mountain biking and couldn't be happier with the balance between comfort, protection and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great quality and breathe well. I even got in a motorcycle wreck with these and they saved my palms. After that I bought another pair and they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan David Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit and feel great, and on top of that, allow me to use my phone touch screen without having to take them off. So far, no complaints. (using for MBT)
customer_reviews.author: SardonickTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smaller fit than expected Returned Easy to return and purchased larger size
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Really uncomfortable & scratchy especially at wrist. I returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Good quality the lettering and symbol are rubber not just cheap stitching....they run small! I got Men’s small for my 11 year old son who is average size for his age! I’m his mother who wears women’s large gloves (not Fox brand) and they fit me nice a snug the way you’d want these to fit! Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift exchange, the recipient loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Deja

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One use, they broke apart.. not that great I dont suggest you buying these
customer_reviews.author: Angel Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly fine... next time m buying my regular red or black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pumbandad

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these Fox gloves back in 2006 and finally had to replace them this summer. This new pair lasted 4 bike rides before the seams tore. These gloves are nowhere as well made as they were nearly two decades ago. Very disappointed in Fox.
customer_reviews.author: Maria LaPlaca

customer_reviews.title: Tried other gloves didn’t like them as much
customer_reviews.text: Fox dirt Paw gloves Hold up really good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few reviews about them ripping but I used mine alot on motorcycle amd they haven't ripped cool color and design definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alan sosa

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My hands are virtually the only unscratched part of me - my knuckles have kissed plenty of trees and I’ve had way too many diggers into rocky soil to count - gloves never failed
customer_reviews.author: beth B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the previous pair that didn't fit my grandson. Fit is perfect for him now.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Size was great, fit well. Grip was nice as well, but only thing I didn’t love was that the gripping was a little too bulky for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Peterson

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: padding is thick enough to protect in falls but thin enough so you dont lose movement and keeps your hands warm riding in the cold
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. And I mean perfect. Will get them again when these wear out
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Working like it should. As expected. True to size. Ordered M
customer_reviews.author: Jessica ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality glove. Perfect fit. I expect to get many years of service out of this glove.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip and feel!
customer_reviews.text: I loved them!! No bad reports! This babies will be with you out there in the hardest trails.
customer_reviews.author: Jose c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Durable
customer_reviews.text: Fox is often our trusted go to for moto gear. Theses did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves, yours hands doesn't hurt after a long rode.good grip but the Velcro doesn't stick well
customer_reviews.author: Tashyra F.

customer_reviews.title: Always been good to me
customer_reviews.text: Feel real good no binding on the top of hands
customer_reviews.author: Over The Bars

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best gloves on the market in my opinion, all fingers work great on touch screens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little tight
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these too much so I dont know about durability. When I first got them they felt a little tight but did loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct to size
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my son for Christmas he loves them .. he races motor cross bikes and always love what I get him from Here
customer_reviews.author: robin herring

customer_reviews.title: Needs Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Fitment and feel is great, but the stitching is horrible. Stitching popped after two weeks, rode maybe twice.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Tried on, but not taken on the trail yet!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! They have a nice and natural feel on the handle grips, clutch and hand brake, yet these gloves seem to offer some decent protection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stitching is horrible
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are complete garbage I purchased in March it is now June 3rd Three months the stitching came apart on the thumb and also on the pinky on both sides
customer_reviews.author: sandra thomas

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: When putting the gloves on the material gets caught in the velcro and frays. Bad design and cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit perfect and are very good quality. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melissa9236

customer_reviews.title: Great quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: You can use your phone while wearing the gloves but it’s a little difficult, but they are great quality and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Crap Glove used only one time on my mountain bike and all ready has a hole in the finger.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It gets uncomfortable since it has bad ventilation and is rough in the inside. It’s also hard to fit your hand in because it doesn’t open enough.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Shpigelman

customer_reviews.title: Stiching or seam issue
customer_reviews.text: The glove came apart at the seam between the thumb and index finger. I returned the glove for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: LM AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son wears them when he is riding his 4 Wheeler he seem to like them alot
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Works well with phone. Good grip on handle bar But tore after 2d wear. And used road riding not MTB’ing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are very good looking and good quality but run very small I ordered 3 sizes larger than the sizing chart and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: true to size
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug, a bit itchy around the wrist area had to add some fabric on the inside. Overall not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Used these gloves for my street bike. Got rear ended and these gloves kept my hands scratch free with only minimal damage to gloves
customer_reviews.author: jay pickett

customer_reviews.title: Just as depicted in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Excellent condition and appears to be an authentic FOX product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! Great feel fit great and look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and feeling gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves run just a little bit small. I ordered a Large and an XL and the large was pretty tight and the XL fit nicely. Great gloves and good look!
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Get one size up
customer_reviews.text: Good price but does fit small so go one size up
customer_reviews.author: Caleb West

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for street riding bikes. These are not the best winter gloves as your hands will get cold riding in conditions around 30 degrees F or less. Clean very easily also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: BEST gloves for the price... and just think the pros use the same ones
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves just not right size id go a size up
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: I Love Fox
customer_reviews.text: I Love Fox Racing They Make The Best Gloves And Last Me 6-7 months I Use Them To Ride BMX, Scoot And My Dirt Bike
customer_reviews.author: Anthony hunter

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Yes it was on time and is wgat they advertised it to be
customer_reviews.author: Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Unpicked
customer_reviews.text: they came unpicked (ripped) i did not have the original box because once i received i throw it away been impossible to exchange
customer_reviews.author: edgar morales

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift for my son, he’s had them for 2 weeks but seem to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Happy with the purchase, they look just like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Bayleigh hardy

product_meta.title: Fox Racing 2020 Dirtpaw Gloves - Race
product_meta.description: A high-performance glove without the high price tag. The freshly-renovated Dirtpaw Glove has armored knuckles, padded Clarino palm, and superior flex-point comfort to remain the top choice for the entry-level rider. The hook-and-loop closure provides a secure fit, and built-in stretch gives you maximum dexterity. The fingertips are touchscreen compatible, too.Features: Stretch polyester construction Padded, single layer Clarino palm Stretch mesh finger gussets for mobility Padded Knuckle provides trail-ready coverage Silicone print at finger tips for lever grip Compression molded neoprene cuff Touch screen compatible Hook-and-loop wrist closure
